titles.title: Equity in Education Act of 2002
To amend title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to apply to that title a burden shifting rule currently applicable to title VII.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 4/9/2002--Introduced. Equity in Education Act of 2002 - Amends Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to apply to the party denying discrimination the burden of proof to show that a practice is reasonably necessary and appropriate to the purpose of the program or activity in question, if the party claiming discrimination demonstrates that the practice has a disproportionately negative effect on a protected class.
